Articles.Content:
Post puns about KSP. should be good for a laugh.

1. Sometimes, this game gets on my Nervas.
2. Baby, I like the way you TWR'k it
I kerbol-ieve it
I survey mint ice cream for science.
I was looking for outer planets, but they proved to be rather Eeloosive.

My favourite ever:

Ad astra per asparagus. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy landings!

What did Jeb score in his piloting exam?

B minmus.

What did Bob get his girlfriend for their anniversary?

A big jool.

Who at KSC works out the cost of the rockets?

Bill.

Bill: Whose is that silver thing in the sky?

Jeb: It's Mun.

How does a kerbal make a chess set?

On a laythe.

What does a kerbal put on his kitchen walls?

Tylos.

What's the most villainous journey you can take in the kerbolar system?

Eve-Vall.

There are parasites on Jool's outermost moon but I can't say any more because discussion of Pol ticks is banned on the forum.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T18:58:54Z" title="08/02/2015 06:58  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by Rainbowtrout**
  
keep the puns child-friendly please

Quit air-hogging the lighted stage, this is all just a lot of hot air--did you really think there's be a mass reaction to a thread of puns?

(I like puns :-) )
I wrecked my lunar expedition, looks like I'll have to do it all rover again. Those Munar craters are really starting to be an arch enemy.

> There are parasites on Jool's outermost moon but I can't say any more because discussion of Pol ticks is banned on the forum.

I laughed harder than I care to admit to at that one...

What's the kraken's favorite toy to play with?

A Bop-it

Bob: "Jeb, how do we know if Minmus really tastes like ice cream?

Jeb: "Taste it, it's a sherbet way to find out."

Why was Bill embarrassed to look at the dwarf planet?

Because it was getting DRESsed
I like the simple fact that to go to space you just hit the Space bar. There's something deeply satisfying about that.
Game-style thread moved to the game-style subforum.

"You sure have some Ker-balls trying to do a grand tour"

"I probably *ant* ever going to use the LV-1 engine"

"I made a trebuchet that flung Kerbals. You could say it was Ker*ballistic*"

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-26T19:11:23Z" title="08/26/2015 07:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 26, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**

Those last few were just plane wrong.

"Flinging Kerbals"....I pray you at least wrote each victim a proper orbit-uary.

What did Jeb say when he got into space?

Mission control, we have passed the Kerman line.
Two drums and a cymbal fall off of the Munar arch.

"I Mk-*won* a race in to Low Kerbin orbit."

"I honestly don't think I can *krack*en another pun."

ADD MOAR BOSSTERS

That didn't work...

 ADD MOAR STRUTS
"Dude, let's play Kerball. They have bouncy heads"

Bob: Where does Kerbin's infinite supply of mint ice cream come from.

Jeb: It comes from SPAAAKKKEEEEE

get it? spak (K for Kerbal)e. No? I'm not funny? Ok. \*walks away quietly\*
How do kerbals act when they are falling to their deaths on a suborbital trajectory? They go ballistic!

When I accidentally quickloaded to a quicksave from before I researched the stuff to make the ship whose explosion caused my to quick load and I lost several hours worth of work, I got pretty mad. In fact, you could even say I went...*Kerballistic*...at what had happened.

\*Kerby Jackson appears\* That sounds like something must've smelled...*Kerfishy*.
